Entries.Tue: I'm tutoring {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/VincentName}} and {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/JasName}} today... They're a handful, but it's nice to make a difference in someone's life.
Entries.Wed: We don't have a school here but I'm doing my best to give {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/VincentName}} and {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/JasName}} a proper education.#$e#Every child deserves a chance to be successful.#$e#{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/JasName}} is very good at math and reading. {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/VincentName}} is good at... well, {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/He:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/VincentGender}}}} has an active imagination!
Entries.Sat2: $d Joja#Things changed a lot after the JojaMart went up. It's been really bad for {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PierreName}}'s shop. Mom loves JojaMart, though. The prices are cheap, so she can afford a lot more there than she ever could at {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PierreName}}'s.|Mom's been complaining ever since JojaMart closed down. I think it's good for her, though. Maybe she'll drink less Joja Cola now.
Entries.event_mail1: Thank you...$l#$b#I just wish {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/GeorgeName}} wasn't so upset... I was only trying to help.$s
Entries.winter_Thu: Oh... hi. You want to talk?$u#$e#If you find any interesting artifacts or minerals, {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/GuntherName}} will gladly display them in the museum.#$e#{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/GuntherGender}}}} told me {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/He:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/GuntherGender}}}} has special gifts for people who donate.
Entries.winter_Fri2: Are you friends with {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/LinusName}}? {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/LinusGender}}}} lives in a tent up in the mountains.#$e#Everyone ignores {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Him:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/LinusGender}}}}, the poor {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Guy:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/LinusGender}}}}. {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/LinusGender}}}}'s actually really nice... Just a little odd.#$e#It must be so cold to live in a tent this time of year.

Entries.Rainy_Day_1: I wonder if {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/MaruName}} and Dr. {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/HarveyName}} will ever get together? I'm sure {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/HarveyName}} likes her...#$e#I think {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/MaruName}} will have to make the first move, though.$h

Entries.marriage_Mon.002: I wonder if {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/MaruName}} will get married some day?

BeforeMovie.Text: Watching a movie with mom sure brings me back!

AfterMovie.Text: It's great to be able to do things as a family again!

BeforeMovie.Text: I'm looking forward to this! {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/JasName}} and {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/VincentName}} have been talking about it non-stop.

DuringMovie.Script: /shake Penny 3000/pause 500/message "{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PennyName}} seems to be holding back some tears..."
DuringMovie.Text: Wow, it must be really hard leaving his family like that...$s

AfterMovie.Text: Thanks for taking me to this, I can't wait to tell the kids how good it was!

BeforeMovie.Text: Oh, '{0}'! This looks wholesome and fun!

AfterMovie.Text: I should totally bring the kids to see this sometime!
